# Node naming and branching UX (2026-01-18 17:17Z)

_**User (2026-01-18 15:24Z)**_

the node naming should be through API call to AI model in parallel of launching request for the name, also in the context for the node "Branch path: Root > Can you" replace it by "Branch path: Root > ." or something like that so you dont need the name to send the request

Then, when I've sent the branching request dont switch to new node yet, leave me in the parent node and have a clear signal in the left pannel when the new node's answer is ready

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Planning node status and breadcrumb placeholders**

I'm preparing to add a status or pending flag to nodes for sidebar display and to modify breadcrumb generation to replace non-root node names with a placeholder like ".", enabling requests without using actual node names.
**Designing breadcrumb placeholders and parallel title requests**

I'm finalizing breadcrumb logic to use ancestor titles but replace only the current node name with a placeholder to avoid relying on new node names in requests. Also planning a parallel AI call to generate short node titles alongside branching requests, adding node status flags for pending/ready and unread indicators in the sidebar list and graph views.</details></think>

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Planning node badge and naming features**

I'm incorporating badges for pending/ready states in both sidebar list and graph views, updating CSS accordingly. For node naming, I'll modify branch creation to generate a placeholder node with "New branch" and request AI naming in parallel, adjusting the addNode call to keep the parent active and handle pending states properly.
**Separating branch loading from main loading**

I'm planning to decouple branch request loading from the global isLoading to avoid showing "Thinking..." or disabling input in the parent during branching. I'll add separate state for branch requests and update node status and titles asynchronously, using Promise.allSettled to handle parallel AI calls for content and naming with fallbacks for title generation.</details></think>

{\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      });\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n    });\n    setTempHighlight({ nodeId, messageIndex: msgIdx, tempId });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      setActiveNodeId(id);\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"New branch\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.nodeId === sourceNodeId) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              tempHighlight.tempId,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        });\n        return {\n          ...prev,\n          [sourceNodeId]: {\n            ...sourceNode,\n            messages: nextMessages,\n          },\n        };\n      });\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    } else if (selectionPopover.messageIndex != null) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        });\n        return {\n          ...prev,\n          [sourceNodeId]: {\n            ...sourceNode,\n            messages: nextMessages,\n          },\n        };\n      });\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...nodesById,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      const [replyResult, titleResult] = await Promise.allSettled([\n        replyPromise,\n        titlePromise,\n      ]);\n      if (titleResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(titleResult.value, fallbackTitle);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n      }\n      if (replyResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n          ...messages,\n          { role: \"assistant\", content: replyResult.value || \"No response returned.\" },\n        ]);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"ready\",\n          hasUnread: true,\n        }));\n      } else {\n        setError(replyResult.reason?.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"idle\",\n        }));\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside className=\"sidebar\" style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onMouseLeave={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onFocus={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onBlur={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                // Avoid creating a new selection while clicking the highlight\n                event.preventDefault();\n              }}\n              onClick={(event) =&gt; {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n                setActiveNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onKeyDown={(event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n        messageIndex: null,\n        nodeId: null,\n      });\n    }\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    }\n  });\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const onKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (event.key === \"Shift\") {\n        const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n        if (payload) {\n          setSelectionPopover({\n            visible: true,\n            text: payload.text,\n            rect: payload.rect,\n            draft: \"\",\n            placement: payload.placement,\n            messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n            nodeId: activeNodeId,\n          });\n        }\n        return;\n      }\n      if (event.key !== \"Escape\") return;\n      window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      if (tempHighlight) {\n        setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n          const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n          if (!node) return prev;\n          const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n          const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n    }\n\n    const tempId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const nodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId;\n    const msgIdx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      });\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n    });\n    setTempHighlight({ nodeId, messageIndex: msgIdx, tempId });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      setActiveNodeId(id);\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"New branch\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"ready\",\n          hasUnread: true,\n        }));\n      } else {\n        setError(replyResult.reason?.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    updateNode(activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onBlur={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                // Avoid creating a new selection while clicking the highlight\n                event.preventDefault();\n              }}\n              onClick={(event) =&gt; {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n                setActiveNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onKeyDown={(event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n    }\n\n    const tempId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const nodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId;\n    const msgIdx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    updateNode(activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      setActiveNodeId(id);\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"New branch\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n      }\n      if (replyResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n          ...messages,\n          { role: \"assistant\", content: replyResult.value || \"No response returned.\" },\n        ]);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"ready\",\n          hasUnread: true,\n        }));\n      } else {\n        setError(replyResult.reason?.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"idle\",\n        }));\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    updateNode(activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst getSvgViewport = (containerRect, viewBoxWidth, viewBoxHeight) =&gt; {\n  // Matches preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n  const scale = Math.min(\n    containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, offsetX, offsetY };\n};\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst truncateForContext = (text, maxChars) =&gt; {\n  if (typeof text !== \"string\") return \"\";\n  const cleaned = text.replace(/\\s+/g, \" \").trim();\n  if (cleaned.length &lt;= maxChars) return cleaned;\n  return &#96;${cleaned.slice(0, Math.max(0, maxChars - 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  const breadcrumb = path\n    .map((id, index) =&gt; {\n      const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;\n      if (index === path.length - 1 &amp;&amp; id !== \"root\") {\n        return \".\";\n      }\n      return nodeTitle || (id === \"root\" ? \"Root\" : null);\n    })\n    .filter(Boolean)\n    .join(\" &gt; \");\n\n  const lines = [\n    \"Hidden context for the assistant (do not repeat verbatim unless asked):\",\n    breadcrumb ? &#96;Branch path: ${breadcrumb}&#96; : \"\",\n  ].filter(Boolean);\n\n  const excerpt = node?.branchContext?.excerpt;\n  if (excerpt) {\n    lines.push(&#96;Branch highlight excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${truncateForContext(excerpt, 1200)}\"\"\"&#96;);\n  }\n\n  const ancestorIds = path.slice(0, -1);\n  if (ancestorIds.length) {\n    lines.push(\"Ancestor snippets (most recent turns):\");\n    ancestorIds.forEach((id) =&gt; {\n      const ancestor = nodesById[id];\n      if (!ancestor) return;\n      const tail = (ancestor.messages || []).slice(-4);\n      if (!tail.length) return;\n      const snippet = tail\n        .map((m) =&gt; &#96;${m.role}: ${truncateForContext(m.content ?? \"\", 220)}&#96;)\n        .join(\"\\n\");\n      lines.push(&#96;- ${ancestor.title}:\\n${snippet}&#96;);\n    });\n  }\n\n  return lines.join(\"\\n\\n\").trim();\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; document.removeEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n  }, [ref, handler]);\n};\n\nconst App = () =&gt; {\n  const [nodesById, setNodesById] = useState(() =&gt; ({\n    root: createRootNode(),\n  }));\n  const [activeNodeId, setActiveNodeId] = useState(\"root\");\n  const [hoveredBranchNodeId, setHoveredBranchNodeId] = useState(null);\n  const [draft, setDraft] = useState(\"\");\n  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);\n  const [error, setError] = useState(\"\");\n  const [treeView, setTreeView] = useState(\"graph\");\n  const [sidebarWidth, setSidebarWidth] = useState(320);\n  const [graphScale, setGraphScale] = useState(1.4);\n  const [graphTranslate, setGraphTranslate] = useState({ x: 0, y: 0 });\n  const [graphHasInteracted, setGraphHasInteracted] = useState(false);\n  const [isContextModalOpen, setIsContextModalOpen] = useState(false);\n  const [selectionPopover, setSelectionPopover] = useState({\n    visible: false,\n    text: \"\",\n    rect: null,\n    draft: \"\",\n    placement: \"above\",\n    messageIndex: null,\n    nodeId: null,\n  });\n  const [tempHighlight, setTempHighlight] = useState(null);\n\n  const chatAreaRef = useRef(null);\n  const inputRef = useRef(null);\n  const popoverRef = useRef(null);\n  const graphContainerRef = useRef(null);\n  const panStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startY: 0,\n    tx: 0,\n    ty: 0,\n  });\n  const resizeStateRef = useRef({\n    active: false,\n    startX: 0,\n    startWidth: 0,\n  });\n\n  const activeNode = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n  const isEmptyThread = (activeNode?.messages?.length ?? 0) === 0;\n  const shouldShowContext = activeNodeId !== \"root\";\n  const childrenMap = useMemo(() =&gt; event.preventDefault()}\n            &gt;\n              {children}\n            &lt;/span&gt;\n          );\n        }\n        if (typeof href === \"string\" &amp;&amp; href.startsWith(\"branch-highlight:\")) {\n          const parts = href.split(\":\");\n          const highlightId = parts[1];\n          const branchNodeId = parts[2];\n          const disableHoverEffects = selectionPopover.visible;\n          const isHovered = !disableHoverEffects &amp;&amp; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onMouseLeave={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onFocus={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onBlur={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                // Avoid creating a new selection while clicking the highlight\n                event.preventDefault();\n              }}\n              onClick={(event) =&gt; {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n                setActiveNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onKeyDown={(event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n      setSelectionPopover({\n        visible: false,\n        text: \"\",\n        rect: null,\n        draft: \"\",\n        placement: \"above\",\n        messageIndex: null,\n        nodeId: null,\n      });\n    }\n    if (tempHighlight) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    }\n  });\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const onKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (event.key === \"Shift\") {\n        const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n        if (payload) {\n          setSelectionPopover({\n            visible: true,\n            text: payload.text,\n            rect: payload.rect,\n            draft: \"\",\n            placement: payload.placement,\n            messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n            nodeId: activeNodeId,\n          });\n        }\n        return;\n      }\n      if (event.key !== \"Escape\") return;\n      window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      if (tempHighlight) {\n        setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n          const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n          if (!node) return prev;\n          const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n          const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n    }\n\n    const tempId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const nodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId;\n    const msgIdx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    updateNode(activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n      if (!node?.hasUnread) return node;\n      return {\n        ...node,\n        hasUnread: false,\n        requestStatus: node.requestStatus === \"ready\" ? \"idle\" : node.requestStatus,\n      };\n    });\n  }, [activeNodeId]);\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      setActiveNodeId(id);\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"New branch\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        });\n        return {\n          ...prev,\n          [sourceNodeId]: {\n            ...sourceNode,\n            messages: nextMessages,\n          },\n        };\n      });\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...nodesById,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      const [replyResult, titleResult] = await Promise.allSettled([\n        replyPromise,\n        titlePromise,\n      ]);\n      if (titleResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(titleResult.value, fallbackTitle);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n      }\n      if (replyResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n          ...messages,\n          { role: \"assistant\", content: replyResult.value || \"No response returned.\" },\n        ]);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"ready\",\n          hasUnread: true,\n        }));\n      } else {\n        setError(replyResult.reason?.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"idle\",\n        }));\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; BRANCH_HL_START.length : TEMP_HL_START.length),\n              metaEndIdx,\n            );\n            const contentStartIdx = metaEndIdx + 3;\n            const endIdx = value.indexOf(isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_END : TEMP_HL_END, contentStartIdx);\n            if (endIdx === -1) break;\n\n            const before = value.slice(0, startIdx);\n            const inside = value.slice(contentStartIdx, endIdx);\n            const after = value.slice(\n              endIdx + (isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_END.length : TEMP_HL_END.length),\n            );\n\n            if (before) nextChildren.push({ type: \"text\", value: before });\n            if (isBranch) {\n              const [highlightId, branchNodeId] = meta.split(\":\");\n              if (!highlightId || !branchNodeId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;branch-highlight:${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            } else {\n              const tempId = meta;\n              if (!tempId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;temp-highlight:${tempId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            }\n\n            value = after;\n          }\n\n          if (value) {\n            nextChildren.push({ ...child, value });\n          }\n          return;\n        }\n\n        transformNode(child);\n        nextChildren.push(child);\n      });\n      node.children = nextChildren;\n      return;\n    }\n\n    Object.values(node).forEach((value) =&gt; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst getSvgViewport = (containerRect, viewBoxWidth, viewBoxHeight) =&gt; {\n  // Matches preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n  const scale = Math.min(\n    containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, offsetX, offsetY };\n};\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst truncateForContext = (text, maxChars) =&gt; {\n  if (typeof text !== \"string\") return \"\";\n  const cleaned = text.replace(/\\s+/g, \" \").trim();\n  if (cleaned.length &lt;= maxChars) return cleaned;\n  return &#96;${cleaned.slice(0, Math.max(0, maxChars - 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  const breadcrumb = path\n    .map((id, index) =&gt; {\n      const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;\n      if (index === path.length - 1 &amp;&amp; id !== \"root\") {\n        return \".\";\n      }\n      return nodeTitle || (id === \"root\" ? \"Root\" : null);\n    })\n    .filter(Boolean)\n    .join(\" &gt; \");\n\n  const lines = [\n    \"Hidden context for the assistant (do not repeat verbatim unless asked):\",\n    breadcrumb ? &#96;Branch path: ${breadcrumb}&#96; : \"\",\n  ].filter(Boolean);\n\n  const excerpt = node?.branchContext?.excerpt;\n  if (excerpt) {\n    lines.push(&#96;Branch highlight excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${truncateForContext(excerpt, 1200)}\"\"\"&#96;);\n  }\n\n  const ancestorIds = path.slice(0, -1);\n  if (ancestorIds.length) {\n    lines.push(\"Ancestor snippets (most recent turns):\");\n    ancestorIds.forEach((id) =&gt; {\n      const ancestor = nodesById[id];\n      if (!ancestor) return;\n      const tail = (ancestor.messages || []).slice(-4);\n      if (!tail.length) return;\n      const snippet = tail\n        .map((m) =&gt; &#96;${m.role}: ${truncateForContext(m.content ?? \"\", 220)}&#96;)\n        .join(\"\\n\");\n      lines.push(&#96;- ${ancestor.title}:\\n${snippet}&#96;);\n    });\n  }\n\n  return lines.join(\"\\n\\n\").trim();\n};\n\nconst useClickOutside = (ref, handler) =&gt; {\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const listener = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!ref.current || ref.current.contains(event.target)) {\n        return;\n      }\n      handler(event);\n    };\n    document.addEventListener(\"mousedown\", listener);\n    return () =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n      }\n      if (replyResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n          ...messages,\n          { role: \"assistant\", content: replyResult.value || \"No response returned.\" },\n        ]);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n  const transformNode = (node) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    if (Array.isArray(node.children)) {\n      const nextChildren = [];\n      node.children.forEach((child) =&gt; {\n        if (child?.type === \"text\" &amp;&amp; typeof child.value === \"string\") {\n          let value = child.value;\n          while (true) {\n            const branchIdx = value.indexOf(BRANCH_HL_START);\n            const tempIdx = value.indexOf(TEMP_HL_START);\n            const startIdx =\n              branchIdx === -1\n                ? tempIdx\n                : tempIdx === -1\n                  ? branchIdx\n                  : Math.min(branchIdx, tempIdx);\n            if (startIdx === -1) break;\n            const isBranch = startIdx === branchIdx;\n            const metaEndIdx = value.indexOf(\"]]]\", startIdx);\n            if (metaEndIdx === -1) break;\n            const meta = value.slice(\n              startIdx + (isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_START.length : TEMP_HL_START.length),\n              metaEndIdx,\n            );\n            const contentStartIdx = metaEndIdx + 3;\n            const endIdx = value.indexOf(isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_END : TEMP_HL_END, contentStartIdx);\n            if (endIdx === -1) break;\n\n            const before = value.slice(0, startIdx);\n            const inside = value.slice(contentStartIdx, endIdx);\n            const after = value.slice(\n              endIdx + (isBranch ? BRANCH_HL_END.length : TEMP_HL_END.length),\n            );\n\n            if (before) nextChildren.push({ type: \"text\", value: before });\n            if (isBranch) {\n              const [highlightId, branchNodeId] = meta.split(\":\");\n              if (!highlightId || !branchNodeId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;branch-highlight:${highlightId}:${branchNodeId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            } else {\n              const tempId = meta;\n              if (!tempId) break;\n              nextChildren.push({\n                type: \"link\",\n                url: &#96;temp-highlight:${tempId}&#96;,\n                children: [{ type: \"text\", value: inside }],\n              });\n            }\n\n            value = after;\n          }\n\n          if (value) {\n            nextChildren.push({ ...child, value });\n          }\n          return;\n        }\n\n        transformNode(child);\n        nextChildren.push(child);\n      });\n      node.children = nextChildren;\n      return;\n    }\n\n    Object.values(node).forEach((value) =&gt; {\n      if (value &amp;&amp; typeof value === \"object\") transformNode(value);\n    });\n  };\n\n  return (tree) =&gt; {\n    transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst getSvgViewport = (containerRect, viewBoxWidth, viewBoxHeight) =&gt; {\n  // Matches preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n  const scale = Math.min(\n    containerRect.width / viewBoxWidth,\n    containerRect.height / viewBoxHeight,\n  );\n  const offsetX = (containerRect.width - viewBoxWidth * scale) / 2;\n  const offsetY = 0;\n  return { scale, offsetX, offsetY };\n};\n\nconst buildChildrenMap = (nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const map = {};\n  Object.values(nodesById).forEach((node) =&gt; {\n    const parent = node.parentId ?? \"root-parent\";\n    if (!map[parent]) {\n      map[parent] = [];\n    }\n    map[parent].push(node.id);\n  });\n  return map;\n};\n\nconst truncateForContext = (text, maxChars) =&gt; {\n  if (typeof text !== \"string\") return \"\";\n  const cleaned = text.replace(/\\s+/g, \" \").trim();\n  if (cleaned.length &lt;= maxChars) return cleaned;\n  return &#96;${cleaned.slice(0, Math.max(0, maxChars - 1))}…&#96;;\n};\n\nconst getNodePathToRoot = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const path = [];\n  const visited = new Set();\n  let currentId = nodeId;\n  while (currentId &amp;&amp; nodesById[currentId] &amp;&amp; !visited.has(currentId)) {\n    visited.add(currentId);\n    path.push(currentId);\n    currentId = nodesById[currentId].parentId;\n  }\n  return path.reverse();\n};\n\nconst buildHiddenContextForNode = (nodeId, nodesById) =&gt; {\n  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n  if (!node) return \"\";\n\n  const path = getNodePathToRoot(nodeId, nodesById);\n  const breadcrumb = path\n    .map((id, index) =&gt; {\n      const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;\n      if (index === path.length - 1 &amp;&amp; : \"\",\n  ].filter(Boolean);\n\n  const excerpt = node?.branchContext?.excerpt;\n  if (excerpt) {\n    lines.push(&#96;Branch highlight excerpt:\\n\"\"\"${truncateForContext(excerpt, 1200)}\"\"\"&#96;);\n  }\n\n  const ancestorIds = path.slice(0, -1);\n  if (ancestorIds.length) {\n    lines.push(\"Ancestor snippets (most recent turns):\");\n    ancestorIds.forEach((id) =&gt;
