{\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n      }\n      if (replyResult.status === \"fulfilled\") {\n        updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n          ...messages,\n          { role: \"assistant\", content: replyResult.value || \"No response returned.\" },\n        ]);\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"ready\",\n          hasUnread: true,\n        }));\n      } else {\n        setError(replyResult.reason?.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n        updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n          ...node,\n          requestStatus: \"idle\",\n        }));\n      }\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; messageIndexRaw !== \"\"\n        ? Number(messageIndexRaw)\n        : null;\n\n    return {\n      text,\n      rect: { top, left },\n      placement,\n      messageIndex: Number.isFinite(messageIndex) ? messageIndex : null,\n    };\n  };\n\n  const handleSelection = (event) =&gt; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"tree-badge pending\"&gt;Pending&lt;/span&gt;}\n            {!isPending &amp;&amp; isReady &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=\"tree-badge ready\"&gt;Ready&lt;/span&gt;}\n          &lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/button&gt;\n        {children.map((childId) =&gt; renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    );\n  };\n\n  const resizeInput = (element) =&gt; {\n    if (!element) return;\n    element.style.height = \"auto\";\n    element.style.height = &#96;${element.scrollHeight}px&#96;;\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside className=\"sidebar\" style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; }
```

---

Updated the branch flow so node naming happens via an AI call in parallel with the branch response, the context breadcrumb uses `Root > .` for the current node, and new branches stay in the parent while showing Pending/Ready status in the left panel (list + graph).

Key changes in `handleBranchSend`, async title generation, and status handling:
```
724:884:src/App.jsx
const normalizeGeneratedTitle = (title, fallback = "New branch") => {
  if (typeof title !== "string") return fallback;
  const cleaned = title.replace(/\s+/g, " ").trim();
  if (!cleaned) return fallback;
  const words = cleaned.split(" ").filter(Boolean);
  if (!words.length) return fallback;
  return words.slice(0, 4).join(" ");
};

// ...

const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) => {
  const prompt = [
    "Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.",
    "Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.",
    "",
    `User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}`,
    branchExcerpt
      ? `Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}`
      : "",
  ]
    .filter(Boolean)
    .join("\n");
  return sendToOpenAI([{ role: "user", content: prompt }]);
};

// ...

const handleBranchSend = async () => {
  if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {
    return;
  }
  setError("");
  const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;
  const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();
  const fallbackTitle = "New branch";
  const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();
  const newNodeId = addNode(
    sourceNodeId,
    fallbackTitle,
    [{ role: "user", content: userMessage }],
    {
      branchContext: {
        excerpt: branchExcerpt,
        sourceNodeId,
        createdAt: Date.now(),
      },
      requestStatus: "pending",
      hasUnread: false,
    },
    { activate: false },
  );

  // ... highlight wiring ...

  const nodesWithNew = {
    ...nodesById,
    [newNodeId]: {
      id: newNodeId,
      parentId: sourceNodeId,
      title: fallbackTitle,
      messages: [{ role: "user", content: userMessage }],
      branchContext: {
        excerpt: branchExcerpt,
        sourceNodeId,
        createdAt: Date.now(),
      },
      requestStatus: "pending",
      hasUnread: false,
    },
  };
  const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);
  const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: "user", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);
  const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);
  const [replyResult, titleResult] = await Promise.allSettled([
    replyPromise,
    titlePromise,
  ]);
  if (titleResult.status === "fulfilled") {
    const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(titleResult.value, fallbackTitle);
    updateNode(newNodeId, (node) => ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));
  }
  if (replyResult.status === "fulfilled") {
    updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) => [
      ...messages,
      { role: "assistant", content: replyResult.value || "No response returned." },
    ]);
    updateNode(newNodeId, (node) => ({
      ...node,
      requestStatus: "ready",
      hasUnread: true,
    }));
  } else {
    setError(replyResult.reason?.message || "Failed to reach OpenAI.");
    updateNode(newNodeId, (node) => ({
      ...node,
      requestStatus: "idle",
    }));
  }
};
```

Breadcrumb now uses a dot for the current node:
```
272:307:src/App.jsx
const breadcrumb = path
  .map((id, index) => {
    const nodeTitle = nodesById[id]?.title;
    if (index === path.length - 1 && id !== "root") {
      return ".";
    }
    return nodeTitle || (id === "root" ? "Root" : null);
  })
  .filter(Boolean)
  .join(" > ");
```

Left panel indicators in list and graph:
```
943:1173:src/App.jsx
const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) => {
  const node = nodesById[nodeId];
  const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];
  const isPending = node?.requestStatus === "pending";
  const isReady = node?.hasUnread;
  return (
    <div key={nodeId}>
      <button
        className={`tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? "active" : ""} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? "branch-hover" : ""}`}
        style={{ paddingLeft: `${12 + depth * 16}px` }}
        onClick={() => setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}
        onMouseEnter={() => setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}
        onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}
        type="button"
      >
        <span className="tree-item-label">
          <span className="tree-title">{node.title}</span>
          {isPending && <span className="tree-badge pending">Pending</span>}
          {!isPending && isReady && <span className="tree-badge ready">Ready</span>}
        </span>
      </button>
      {children.map((childId) => renderTree(childId, depth + 1))}
    </div>
  );
};

// ...

{Object.entries(graphLayout.positions).map(([nodeId, pos]) => {
  const node = nodesById[nodeId];
  const words = node.title.split(" ").filter(Boolean);
  const isPending = node?.requestStatus === "pending";
  const isReady = node?.hasUnread;
  return (
    <g
      key={nodeId}
      className={`graph-node ${nodeId === activeNodeId ? "active" : ""} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? "branch-hover" : ""}`}
      onClick={() => setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}
      onMouseEnter={() => setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}
      onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}
    >
      <circle cx={pos.x} cy={pos.y} r="34" />
      {isPending && (
        <circle
          className="graph-node-badge pending"
          cx={pos.x + 22}
          cy={pos.y - 22}
          r="6"
        />
      )}
      {!isPending && isReady && (
        <circle
          className="graph-node-badge ready"
          cx={pos.x + 22}
          cy={pos.y - 22}
          r="6"
        />
      )}
      <text x={pos.x} y={pos.y} textAnchor="middle">
        {/* ... */}
      </text>
    </g>
  );
})}

Notes
- The branch request no longer changes `activeNodeId`; you stay on the parent and get a Pending/Ready signal in the left panel.
- Ready indicators clear automatically when you open that node.
- I didn’t run UI tests.

If you want different wording/colors for the badge or a persistent “ready” state even after visiting the node, say the word and I’ll tweak it.

{\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onBlur={() =&gt; {\n                if (disableHoverEffects) return;\n                setHoveredBranchNodeId(null);\n              }}\n              onMouseDown={(event) =&gt; {\n                // Avoid creating a new selection while clicking the highlight\n                event.preventDefault();\n              }}\n              onClick={(event) =&gt; {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n                setActiveNodeId(branchNodeId);\n              }}\n              onKeyDown={(event) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; {\n        const node = prev[tempHighlight.nodeId];\n        if (!node) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return { ...m, content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId) };\n        });\n        return { ...prev, [tempHighlight.nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n      });\n    }\n\n    const tempId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const nodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId;\n    const msgIdx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n    const positions = {};\n    const edges = [];\n    let xCursor = 80;\n    let maxDepth = 0;\n\n    const walk = (nodeId, depth) =&gt; {\n      maxDepth = Math.max(maxDepth, depth);\n      const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n      if (children.length === 0) {\n        positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: childId });\n        walk(childId, depth + 1);\n      });\n      const childXs = children.map((childId) =&gt; positions[childId].x);\n      const mid = (Math.min(...childXs) + Math.max(...childXs)) / 2;\n      positions[nodeId] = { x: mid, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n    };\n\n    walk(\"root\", 0);\n\n    return {\n      positions,\n      edges,\n      width: Math.max(xCursor + 120, 240),\n      height: (maxDepth + 1) * 160 + 120,\n    };\n  }, [childrenMap]);\n\n  useLayoutEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (treeView !== \"graph\" || graphHasInteracted) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const rootPos = graphLayout.positions.root;\n    if (!rootPos) return;\n    const nodeRadiusUser = 34;\n    const paddingPx = 12;\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const targetXUser = (rect.width / 2 - offsetX) / s;\n    const targetYUser = (paddingPx - offsetY) / s + nodeRadiusUser * graphScale;\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: targetXUser - rootPos.x * graphScale,\n      y: targetYUser - rootPos.y * graphScale,\n    });\n  }, [treeView, graphLayout, graphScale, graphHasInteracted, sidebarWidth]);\n\n  useClickOutside(popoverRef, () =&gt; Updated the placeholder title to `...` and decoupled title fetching from the branch answer so it can update as soon as it returns.

Key change: the title request now resolves independently and updates the node immediately (no waiting on the answer), so you should see the title before the green “ready” dot.

```
736:835:src/App.jsx
const normalizeGeneratedTitle = (title, fallback = "...") => {
  if (typeof title !== "string") return fallback;
  const cleaned = title.replace(/\s+/g, " ").trim();
  if (!cleaned) return fallback;
  const words = cleaned.split(" ").filter(Boolean);
  if (!words.length) return fallback;
  return words.slice(0, 4).join(" ");
};

// ...

const fallbackTitle = "...";

// ...

const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: "user", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);
const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);
titlePromise
  .then((title) => {
    const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);
    updateNode(newNodeId, (node) => ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));
  })
  .catch(() => {});

const reply = await replyPromise;
updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) => [
  ...messages,
  { role: "assistant", content: reply || "No response returned." },
]);
updateNode(newNodeId, (node) => ({
  ...node,
  requestStatus: "ready",
  hasUnread: true,
}));
```

If you want the placeholder to be visible in the graph as `...` (currently yes), or want a different placeholder, tell me.
